title: Salam Bombay
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A casual and authentic gluten free Indian restaurant offering a rich selection of dishes which are all made-in-house each day. Atmosphere is authentic Indian. Serves one type of plate with a center portion of rice and two types of dahl, with the rest of the plate consisting of your choice of chana, gobhi aloo, peas, lentils, potatoes, squash and eggplant. Has vegan choices. Uses no dairy products.
